mapper.sql: breakdown_id, serial_number, breakdown_code, breakdown_desc, maintainer, maintain_date, status, mode_id, wind_id, dealwith_team_id, dealwith_person, position_id, position_desc, crew_id, equipment_id, equipment_desc, vane_speed, blade_torque_1, blade_torque_2, blade_torque_3, active_time, recover_time, downtime_windspeed, recover_windspeed, interrupt_time, electricity_loss, grid_connected_recover_time, location_id, attribute_id, maximum_load, system_busbar_110, system_busbar_35, system_busbar_400, remark

a.breakdown_id as breakdown_id,a.serial_number as serial_number,a.breakdown_code as breakdown_code,a.breakdown_desc as breakdown_desc, a.maintainer as maintainer,a.maintain_date as maintain_date,a.status as status,a.mode_id as mode_id,a.wind_id as wind_id, a.dealwith_team_id as dealwith_team_id,a.dealwith_person as dealwith_person,a.position_id as position_id,a.position_desc as position_desc, a.crew_id as crew_id,a.equipment_id as equipment_id,a.equipment_desc as equipment_desc,a.vane_speed as vane_speed,a.blade_torque_1 as blade_torque_1, a.blade_torque_2 as blade_torque_2,a.blade_torque_3 as blade_torque_3,a.active_time as active_time,a.recover_time as recover_time, a.downtime_windspeed as downtime_windspeed,a.recover_windspeed as recover_windspeed,a.interrupt_time as interrupt_time, a.electricity_loss as electricity_loss,a.grid_connected_recover_time as grid_connected_recover_time,a.location_id as location_id, a.attribute_id as attribute_id,a.maximum_load as maximum_load,a.system_busbar_110 as system_busbar_110,a.system_busbar_35 as system_busbar_35, a.system_busbar_400 as system_busbar_400,a.remark as remark,b.mode_name as mode_name,c.wind_name as wind_name, e.position_name as position_name,f.crew_name as crew_name,h.location_name as location_name, i.attribute_name as attribute_name
mapper.select:
select
from breakdown_info a left join breakdown_dealwith_mode b on a.mode_id=b.mode_id left join wind_field c on a.wind_id = c.wind_id
left join position_encode e on a.position_id = e.position_id left join crew_information f on a.crew_id = f.crew_id
left join breakdown_location h on a.location_id = h.location_id left join breakdown_attribute i on a.attribute_id = i.attribute_id where a.status <> '0'

select
distinct
from breakdown_info
order by ${orderByClause}
